name: ClimateFiller
description: ClimateFiller is a Python framework for climate time-series quality control and gap-filling, using ERA5-Land reanalysis data and machine learning to detect missing values, outliers, and apply physics-based constraints.

name: Atlas-Chat
description: Atlas-Chat is a family of large language models adapted for Moroccan Arabic (Darija), instruction-tuned on curated and synthetic datasets to enable high-quality dialogue and NLP capabilities in low-resource dialectal Arabic.
domain: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning & Data Science

name: Data Science Toolkit
description: Data Science Toolkit (DST) is a Python library that wraps common data science libraries to provide higher-level, human-readable abstractions for data handling, modeling, and visualization, improving productivity in research workflows.
domain: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning & Data Science

name: PlantLAI
description: PlantLAI is a large-scale data repository and web tool that uses the LTR Assembly Index (LAI) to assess the quality of 1,664 plant and algal genome assemblies and allows users to compute LAI scores for newly assembled genomes.

name: MegaLTR
description: MegaLTR is a web server and standalone pipeline for genome-wide detection, classification, annotation, and analysis of LTR-retrotransposons in plant genomes, including insertion time estimation and LTR-gene chimera analysis.

name: PlantLTRdb
description: PlantLTRdb is an encyclopedia of intact LTR-retrotransposons in 195 plant species, providing a hub to explore their structural variation, insertion age, gene proximity, and LTR–gene chimeras across plant genomes.

name: AfroTB
description: AfroTB is a large-scale curated genomic dataset of Mycobacterium tuberculosis strains from across Africa, providing resistance-associated mutations, phylogenetic classification, and metadata for comparative and evolutionary analyses.

name: CicerSpTEdb
description: CicerSpTEdb is a web-based database for high-resolution, genome-wide identification of transposable elements in Cicer species, enabling search, browsing, and download of TE annotations to support legume genomics and marker development.

name: MegaSSR
description: MegaSSR is a web server and standalone pipeline for large-scale identification, classification, and marker development of simple sequence repeats (SSRs), including primer design, in silico PCR validation, and visualization.

name: AlignStatPlot
description: AlignStatPlot is an R package and online tool for robust statistics and innovative visualization of multiple sequence alignments, enabling post-MSA analysis and diversity exploration on large-scale sequencing data.

name: TEMMarkers
description: TEMMarkers (TEMM) is a curated data resource of transposon element-based molecular markers in plants, aggregating primer sequences, PCR programs, and applications across TE-based marker systems for plant breeding and diversity studies.

name: PltRNAdb
description: PltRNAdb is a plant transfer RNA (tRNA) database providing predicted nuclear and organellar tRNA genes from 256 plant species, with tools to search, browse, visualize, BLAST, and download tRNA annotations and statistics.

name: Bioinformatics Platform
description: The UM6P Bioinformatics Platform is a web-based hub hosting multiple genomics and bioinformatics tools, including plant genome and transposable element databases, large-scale SSR/LTR analysis servers, and alignment visualization utilities.

name: PlantDeBERTa
description: PlantDeBERTa is a DeBERTa-based language model adapted to plant science for high-precision named entity recognition in plant stress-response literature, enabling structured knowledge extraction and ontology-aligned information retrieval.

name: Toubkal Supercomputer HPC
description: The Toubkal Supercomputer at UM6P is a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster providing compute, storage, and GPU resources to accelerate research workflows, documented with guides for access, modules, SLURM usage, and software policies.

name: mumps4py
description: Mumps4py is a Python interface to the MUMPS sparse linear solver, providing MPI-based parallel direct solvers for large sparse systems via a Cython wrapper.

name: MANAPY
description: MANAPY is a Python 3 library for finite volume methods on unstructured grids, providing an MPI-based framework for solving Poisson’s equation in computational physics applications.

name: MegaPlantTF
description: MegaPlantTF is a machine learning framework and web server for comprehensive identification and family-level classification of plant transcription factors across multiple plant species.

name: GeneLM
description: GeneLM is a genomic language model for bacterial coding sequence (CDS) prediction and Translation Initiation Site (TIS) refinement, implemented as a two-stage transformer-based pipeline.

name: SAGDA
description: SAGDA (Synthetic Agriculture Data in Africa) is a Python library for generating, augmenting, and validating synthetic agricultural datasets for African regions.

name: AGRS
description: AGRS is a domain-focused Python library that turns Sentinel-2 imagery into agronomy-ready features for various agronomic applications.

name: sympde
description: SymPDE is a symbolic calculus library for partial differential equations (PDEs) and variational forms.

name: pyccel
description: Pyccel is an extension language that transpiles numerical Python code to fast low-level (Fortran/C) code for scientific high-performance computing.

name: psydac
description: PSYDAC is a library for isogeometric analysis (IGA), providing high-performance parallel solvers for PDEs and integration with Pyccel.
